: : SharpClaw : :
SharpClaw released his hold on KitKat's neck.
SharpClaw: I did it so we wouldnt lose a good Predacon, with a warriors heart like yours, in a futile mission. Your plan would not have worked. You may have gotton some of them, but word would have spread. Most of them would have taken actions, protecting themselves. Then they would have found a vaccine, if they hadn't already. You have to know this. I decided you were worth more alive with us then dead with the Maximals.
 raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:KitKat::

She growled at him as he had her pinned. "Why did you do this?"




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : SharpClaw : :
> SharpClaw had been tained to sleep lightly and on alert. As KitKat 
came at him, he turned, grabbing her wolf form by the neck. He pinned 
her back against the couch.
> SharpClaw: Relax KitKat. I mean you no harm. That's why your here.
>  raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:KitKat::
> 
> She awoke on the bed. She looked around and remembered the last 
> mental transmission from Carnatron. Then she started to growl as 
she 
> remembered SharpClaw hitting her. She stood up on the bed in wolf 
> mode and looked at SparpClaw's sleeping form. She growled very 
> loudly. She leaped from the bed and to the floor. With bared teeth, 
> she leaped at SharpClaw, aiming to bite his throat.
> 
>
